RnBeads
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which RnBeads installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using RnBeads, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load RnBeads/2.6.0-foss-2020a-R-4.0.0
```
